name: Meme Chat Private Limited
description: Developer of an online platform intended to help meme creators receive remuneration from brands for their content. The company's platform leverages technology to provide a space for users to express themselves in the form of memes on a plethora of issues and also for brands to access those memes, enabling creators to create memes using paid templates and get paid upon their approval or earn making memes in the requested category and get paid.
one_liner: Developer of an online platform intended to help meme creators receive remuneration from brands for their content. The company's platform leverages technology to provide a space for users to express themselves in the form of memes on a plethora of issues and also for brands to access those memes, enabling creators to create memes using paid templates and get paid upon their approval or earn making memes in the requested category and get paid.
